<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memtag/#abc9e58a3e27b86d2eb05efba577c6000"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memtag/#abc9e58a3e27b86d2eb05efba577c6000">incrementThreadLong</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;IRB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ThreadLong,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">                           </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Inc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the ring buffer. Top byte of ThreadLong defines the size of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// buffer in pages, it must be a power of two, and the start of the buffer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// must be aligned by twice that much. Therefore wrap around of the ring</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// buffer is simply Addr &amp;= ~((ThreadLong &gt;&gt; 56) &lt;&lt; 12).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The use of AShr instead of LShr is due to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   https://bugs.llvm.org/show&#95;bug.cgi?id=39030</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Runtime library makes sure not to use the highest bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mechanical proof of this address calculation can be found at:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// https://github.com/google/sanitizers/blob/master/hwaddress-sanitizer/prove&#95;hwasanwrap.smt2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example of the wrap case for N = 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pointer:   120095990063214600</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            8</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     =</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            120095990063214600</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     &amp;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// WrapMask:  18446744073709548000</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                     =</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//            120095990063210500</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then the WrapMask will be a no-op until the next wrap case.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((4096 % Inc) == 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;WrapMask = IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#add2225af2af25968f26ed4cb0db94dbe">CreateXor</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">      IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a9b6a3be6451cf6a789d9305d90751c40">CreateShl</a>(IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#adc6a2686b807c18e4a7f7fc58e68d423">CreateAShr</a>(ThreadLong, 56), 12, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      ConstantInt::get(ThreadLong-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), (uint64&#95;t)-1));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa4f2cec52a8e17a4c72319334fbef771">CreateAnd</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      IRB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aada1d6d8de104a5cd1cb9a02c676cc6c">CreateAdd</a>(ThreadLong, ConstantInt::get(ThreadLong-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), Inc)),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">      WrapMask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
